original_text: Behold, while thou yet talkest there with the king, I also will come in after thee, and confirm thy words.
korean_text: 당신이 거기서 왕과 말씀하실 때에 나도 뒤이어 들어가서 당신의 말씀을 확증하리이다

sentences.original_text: while thou yet talkest there with the king
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 거기서 왕과 아직 말하고 있을 때

sentences.original_text: I also will come in after thee
